name: aqueduct
description: Aqueduct: API and Socket client for ERC dEXCHANGE
author: ERC dEx

scripts.generate:docs: rimraf docs && npm run build:docs-app && npm run generate:client:local && rimraf ./docs_src/src/frames/typedoc && typedoc --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --theme themes/custom --readme none --name "Aqueduct JavaScript Client" --mode modules --out ./docs/frames/typedoc ./src/generated/aqueduct.ts && npm run rename:typedoc-html
